venue.name: Roots and Wings Yoga and Healing ArtsCenter

item.description:
Time Management and the Law of Attraction

  • Do you get overwhelmed and stressed by your “to-do” list?
  • Feel like you need to have special powers to take care of all that you have to do?
  • Well, what if you DO have those special powers?

Come learn from author/consultant, Pam Kristan, and get hands-on practice about how you can use the law of attraction and your spiritual given gifts to manage your time and what you do with it.

Learn how to feel good AND get things done effectively and with ease!

Sounds like a win-win to me!

Please be considerate of your hosts (that's me, Mark, and Pam), and honor your "yes" RSVP by either showing up or letting us know if your plans change by changing your RSVP. Many of you have been wonderful about this, and we very much appreciate your understanding, consideration and support! Thank you!

Pam Kristan, author of Awakening In Time: Practical Time Management for Those on a Spiritual Path, has been teaching and consulting since the late 80’s. She was called on as an expert to moderate speak-outs at National Take Back Your Time Day. Her spirituality draws on LOA, text-based, earth-centered, and channeled material.

Looking forward to enjoying this special event with you!

Ann and Mark
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the Wings studio on the first floor

group.name: "Good Vibrations" Metro West Law of Attraction Community

item.name: Time Management and the Law of Attraction
